headline: Is Kroger (KR) Retreat from In-Store Clinics a Sharper Focus or a Missed Retail Edge?
summary: Kroger recently moved to close all 18 Georgia locations of its in-store health clinics, The Little Clinic, as part of broader cost-cutting steps aimed at offsetting rising operating expenses and reimbursement pressures. The retrenchment from in-store healthcare underscores Kroger’s decision to prioritize its core grocery and private-label offerings, even as many retailers emphasize health and wellness as a differentiator. Against this backdrop, we’ll explore how Kroger’s withdrawal from The...
